com.psddev.cms.db

Class PageStage

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.psddev.dari.db.Record
      • com.psddev.cms.db.PageStage
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    com.psddev.dari.db.Recordable, com.psddev.dari.util.HtmlObject, BeanInfo, Cloneable, Comparable<com.psddev.dari.db.Record>

    public class PageStage
extends com.psddev.dari.db.Record
    Holds various data on how to render a page. This class is commonly used to easily update and render the contents of the <head> element.

    For example, given the following class:

    public class Article extends Content implements PageStage.Updatable {

    private String title;

    public String getTitle() {
        return title;
    }

    @Override
    public void updateStage(PageStage stage) {
        stage.setTitle(getTitle());
    }
}

    The following JSP fragment:

    <head>
<cms:render value="${stage.headNodes}" />
</head>

    Will output:

    <head>
<title>The Article Title</title>
</head>

    Additionally, classes can share the update logic using the PageStage.UpdateClass annotation:

    public class DefaultPageStageUpdater implements PageStage.SharedUpdatable {

    @Override
    public void updateStageBefore(Object object, PageStage stage) {
    }

    @Override
    public void updateStageAfter(Object object, PageStage stage) {
        stage.setTitle(stage.getTitle() + " | Site Name");
    }
}

@PageStage.UpdateClass(DefaultPageStageUpdater.class)
public class Article extends Content {
}

    • Nested Class Summary

      Nested Classes 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      static interface  PageStage.SharedUpdatable
      PageFilter will call the appropriate methods if the main content is annotated with PageStage.UpdateClass that points to a class that implements this interface.
      static class  PageStage.TypeData
      Type modification that adds PageStage-specific data.
      static interface  PageStage.Updatable
      PageFilter will call PageStage.Updatable.updateStage(com.psddev.cms.db.PageStage) before rendering if the main content implements this interface.
      static interface  PageStage.UpdateClass
      Specifies the PageStage.Updatable class that will update the PageStage for all instances of the target type.

        public com.psddev.dari.util.HtmlElement findOrCreateHeadElement(String name,
                                                       Object... attributes)
        Finds or creates an element with the given name and attributes within the <head>.

        Note that the stylesheet elements are grouped first, followed by all non-script elements, followed by script elements, with insertion order within the groups preserved.

        Parameters:
        name - Can't be blank.
        attributes - May be null.
        Returns:
        Never null.
